name: Bean Count Storm
description:
Count on the screen randomly distributed small beans, improve your memory.
Right brain left brain memory is 100 times , the internationally renowned brain development experts developed by Dr. Shichida fast wake brain photographic memory training , brain makes you free to manipulate with the previous 1/100 of the time and effort is enough ! This game is advocating a new way of remembering : Intuition image brain memory capacity is crucial ; Imagination Training open brain memory circuits ; horizons expand training wake up " a holographic remember " capability ; using association method , astounding memory effect . Right-brain photographic memory method allows you to enter the brain unconsciously working state , freedom of manipulating brain learn to freedom , hundreds of times to improve learning efficiency , maximize brain capacity .
Choose the right level of difficulty , after entering the game , there will be some small Peas randomly distributed on the screen , then do not rush to count the number of Peas , in my mind will be the scene of the screen as images shot down , Peas disappeared , by virtue of remaining in the eyes of the images and memories in the minds of the Peas silently count out the number , with the continuous exercise, your memory will be enhanced , then you can challenge the next level of difficulty . Through this game effectively train your photographic memory , not only can greatly improve memory efficiency , better able to develop the right brain potential. Day early in the evening to spend a few minutes of exercise, it will greatly improve memory efficiency .

数一数随机分布在屏幕上的小豆豆，提升你的记忆力。
右脑记忆力是左脑的100万倍，国际著名右脑开发专家七田真博士开发的快速唤醒右脑照相记忆力训练，让你学会自由操控右脑，用以往1/100的时间和努力就足够！本游戏倡导全新的记忆方法： 直觉图像能力是右脑记忆的关键；想象训练打开右脑记忆回路；视野扩大训练唤醒“一眼记住全像”能力；运用联想法，取得惊人的记忆效果。超右脑照相记忆法让你在不知不觉中进入右脑工作状态，学会自由自由操纵右脑，数百倍提高学习效率，最大限度发挥右脑能力。
选择合适的难度级别，进入游戏之后，会有一些小豆豆随机分布在屏幕上，这时不要急着去数豆豆的个数，在脑海中将屏幕中的情景当做影像拍下来，豆豆消失后，凭借残留在眼中的影像和脑海中的记忆将豆豆的个数默数出来，随着不断锻炼,你的记忆力将得到提升,此时你可以挑战下一个难度级别。通过这个游戏有效的培养您的照相记忆能力,不仅可以大大提高记忆效率,更能够开发右脑潜能。每天早中晚花几分钟时间锻炼一下,将可以大大提高记忆效率。
